channel.title: Unreal Engine 5 on Markus Meier
channel.description: Recent content in Unreal Engine 5 on Markus Meier

item.title: One Armed Samurai
item.description: One armed Samurai is a short Demo of a horror game I made for my Bachelor Thesis about perspectives and perception.

item.title: Devlog 3: Enemies and Darkness
item.description: In the past few weeks I have worked on some of the horror genre aspects of the game.

item.title: Devlog 2: Visual Endeavors
item.description: In this Developer Diary I will focus on some of the visuals I have created and design choices.

item.title: Devlog 1: Introduction to my Bachelor Thesis
item.description: This is the first post on my Developer Diary of my Bachelor Thesis, a game currently under the working title of “One Armed Samurai”.

item.title: Waldeinsamkeit
item.description: This Page is WIP, but feel free to check it out c:

item.title: Back to the Roots
item.description: This Project was made in one month as a submission for the Game Off 2023 Gamejam.

item.title: Dont Look at Medusa
item.description: Dont’t Look at Medusa is an experimetl VR – Game made in the Unreal Engine 5, focusing around the Mythology of Medusa and exploration of VR Gameplay possibilities.

item.title: Card Game
item.description: This Card Game is a hobby project inspired by Inscryption, powered by Unreal Engine.

item.title: Void Walk
item.description: The project “Void Walk” was created with the intention of exploring a situation between life and death, aswell as exploring remembering and forgetting in a bizarre story.
